document.full_text: boston clawed their way back into the nhl stanley cup finals by mauling the vancouver canucks 8-1 on monday after they were stung into action by a vicious hit on nathan horton.
document.title: bruins maul canucks to claw back into stanley cup
lines_and_colors: boston clawed their way back into the nhl stanley cup finals by mauling the vancouver canucks 8-1 on monday after they were stung into action by a vicious hit on nathan horton.
